amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete the provisions of the bill that disapprove the recommendations of the U.S. Sentencing Commission which make the sentencing guidelines for possession of crack cocaine the same as those for the possession of powder cocaine.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the bill that disapprove of the recommendations of the U.S. Sentencing Commission, which make the sentencing guidelines for possession of crack cocaine the same as those for possession of powder cocaine.
